name: English for Kids
description: English for Kids is a free educational application for children and starters to learn basic English words in a fun way.  Categories ------------------ -Numbers -Fruits -Vegetables -Colors -Transport -Countries -Occupations -School Objects -Verbs -Sports -Music Instruments -Clothes -Foods -Kitchen -Bathroom -Living Room  Parts --------- Learning: A random English word from the selected category is displayed with its picture and pronunciation Game 1: One random picture from the selected category is displayed and you are asked to select the correct English word from the options. Game 2: One random English word from the selected category is displayed and you are asked to select the correct picture from the options.
